text: The Boy Next Door is an American psychological thriller movie. It was released in January 2015. It was directed by Rob Cohen. The movie was written by Barbara Curry. The movie stars are Jennifer Lopez, Ryan Guzman, John Corbett and Kristin Chenoweth. == Plot == After separating from her husband, a woman has a one-night stand with her new 19-year-old neighbor. == Cast == * Jennifer Lopez as Claire Peterson * Ryan Guzman as Noah Sandborn * Kristin Chenoweth * John Corbett * Ian Nelson as Kevin Peterson * Hill Harper * Adam Hicks * Bailey Chase * Travis Schuldt == Other websites == * The Boy Next Door at the Trailer Motion * * The Boy Next Door at the Rotten Tomatoes * The Boy Next Door at the Box Office Mojo Category:2015 movies Category:2015 thriller movies Category:2010s psychological movies Category:Adultery in movies Category:American thriller movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about families Category:Movies about murderers Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Rob Cohen Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: The Boy Next Door
